game.name: TS Marketplace: Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 01
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Magnificent, rugged, and demanding, those are but a few of the words that describe BNSF’s historic Stevens Pass route across the Cascade Mountains! And now, you can take the throttle for contemporary and challenging BNSF railroading across the Cascades in Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 01.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Magnificent, rugged, and demanding, those are but a few of the words that describe BNSF’s historic Stevens Pass route across the Cascade Mountains! And now, you can take the throttle for contemporary and challenging BNSF railroading across the Cascades in Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 01.
